sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 今天是阴天，可能会下雨。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīntiān shì yīntiān, kěnéng huì xiàyǔ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Aujourd'hui il fait gris, il pourrait pleuvoir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Today is cloudy, it might rain.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì zhōng xiǎoxué de lǎoshī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est enseignant au primaire et au secondaire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is a primary and secondary school teacher.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen yǒu tóngyàng de àihào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous avons les mêmes loisirs.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We have the same hobbies.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 今天太累了，我们点外卖吧。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīntiān tài lèi le, wǒmen diǎn wàimài ba.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Aujourd'hui je suis trop fatigué, commandons à livrer.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I'm too tired today, let's order takeout.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiàn shì wǒ lái bàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je m'occupe de cette affaire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I'll handle this matter.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 除了他以外，其他人都来了。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Chúle tā yǐwài, qítā rén dōu lái le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: À part lui, tout le monde est venu.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Apart from him, everyone else came.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ sòng nǐ huíjiā ba.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je te raccompagne chez toi.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Let me see you home.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ zǒuguò nà jiā shāngdiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je suis passé devant ce magasin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I walked past that store.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ mǎi le yī tái xīn xiàngjī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai acheté un nouvel appareil photo.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I bought a new camera.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ jiā lí gōngsī yuǎn ma?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Habites-tu loin de l'entreprise ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Is your home far from the company?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā míngnián xiǎng chūguó liúxué.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle veut aller étudier à l'étranger l'année prochaine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She wants to study abroad next year.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Hěn gāoxìng jiàndào nǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ravi de vous rencontrer.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Nice to meet you.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ gāng jiēdào tā de diànhuà.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je viens de recevoir son appel.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I just received his call.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè tiáo dàolù hěn kuān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette route est très large.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This road is very wide.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我是高中二年级的学生。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ shì gāozhōng èr niánjí de xuéshēng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je suis élève en deuxième année de lycée.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I am a second-year high school student.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yéye měitiān kàn bàozhǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Grand-père lit le journal chaque jour.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Grandpa reads the newspaper every day.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ yǒu yī gè xìngfú de jiātíng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai une famille heureuse.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I have a happy family.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen fēnchéng sān zǔ tǎolùn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous nous divisons en trois groupes pour discuter.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We are divided into three groups to discuss.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīntiān qìwēn hěn dī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La température est très basse aujourd'hui.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The temperature is very low today.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège wǎngzhàn hěn yǒuyòng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce site web est très utile.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This website is very useful.
